creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: a: camel standing on diamond-shaped base; head up with mouth open, tail up and curled; yellow with traces of red and black pigment; double hump; b: man sitting with legs splayed and PR arm up; man wears hat, jacket, pants and boots
title: Two camels and a groom (Camel and groom)
